item.title: How BlackRock and Goldman Sachs are bringing Wall Street's hottest asset class to 401(k)s
item.description: "The alternative market is becoming less alternative," BlackRock's Jon Diorio said. "It's growing very rapidly as public markets are shrinking."

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Here's what happened to financial markets after Nixon pressured the Fed
item.description: Nomura looked back at how markets behaved during Nixon's pressure campaign on the Federal Reserve in the early 1970s.

item.title: Trump's Cook firing will likely end up in the Supreme Court's hands
item.description: Trump is the first president to attempt to fire a Fed governor since Congress established the central bank in 1913, Evercore ISI said.
